item.title: Reawakening habit of writing during times of quarantine
item.description: A couple of years ago I had a good habit of writing semi-regularly about various topics that were interesting to me. These included the first impressions of different technologies, my opinions on different topics, etc. Unfortunately, time passed and I began to write less and less and recently I’ve gotten out of the habit completely. Which is a shame in many ways since I’ve always felt writing to be greatly therapeutic.
